page.title: 16TIMES 1985 C. WRIGHT.
page.content: CLOTHES In school we have to wear a formal uniform which we wear with pride.The school tie has a crest on it which allows people to know which school we attend.I always feel proud to wear my school outfit.At home we wear a variety of clothes.Some are designed for leisure and others for more formal events like discos and family events. SHOES. These again vary with where they are to be worn.We have laced, buckled,court and training shoes all in different sizes and colours. HOBBIES.My hobbies are athletics, swimming and tennis.Each Saturday I get pocket money to spend on recreation.If I have anything left I buy cosmetics ,pencils, pens and books on my favourite sports.For seven years I have never been beaten at a sports meeting.I was sports champion 1985.
